attributes.action: Act immediately to prevent Turkish admission to the EEC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To take all steps possible to prevent Turkish admission to the EEC, until Turkey unconditionally ceases to illegaly occupy that part of northern Cyprus and that part of northern Cyprus is once again reunited with the legitimate and internationally recognised Republic of Cyprus. Then, and only then should Turkish application for membership be considered.
